comments: (n*a(n+1)^3+1)/(n^3+1) is the smallest integer of the form (n*k^3+1)/(n^3+1). - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 02 2002
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = (n-2)^3 + 2 = A084380(n-2). - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 23 2014a(n+1) = A002061(n)*(n-2) + 3. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 23 2014G.f.: x*(1-2*x+x^2+6*x^3)/(1-x)^4. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 23 2014
mathematica: Table[(n-3)(n-2)(n-1)+n,{n,52}](*and/or*)Table[n^3+2,{n,-1,50}]  (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Apr 15 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 2 x + x^2 + 6 x^3)/(1 - x)^4, {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 24 2014 *)
